title: About me
text:
::: {#hero-heading} Hi, I’m Hidde! I’m a Master’s student at Utrecht University, where I study Methodology and Statistics. I’m planning to graduate in June 2024 and I’m currently looking for a PhD position.
Currently I’m writing my Thesis on the performance of Information Criteria and Internal validation techniques in a simulated setting. The project is based in Julius Center for Health Sciences and Primary Care supervised by dr. Maarten van Smeden and dr. Anne de Hond.
In my free time I’m a rower at U.S.R. Triton. Here I train 10-12 times a week and compete in national and international competitions. My most beloved experience is reaching the semi-finals in the Temple eight of the Henley Royal Regatta in 2022.

title: Hidde van de Beek
text:
MSc Methodology and Statistics student at Utrecht University. Interested in Biostatistics, Research design, and Open Science. Also a big fan of the R programming language and the tidyverse ecosystem.
